name: DERE DERE PANIC!
description:
You can't believe your luck! After downloading the hit dating app Galaxy, you didn't think in a millions years you would get a match. Within a few days, though, you got not one, not two, but THREE MATCHES. But with each consecutive date you can't shake off this feeling of familiarity...

Made for the 2022 NEU Game Jam.

Note: Unfortunately the game is not completely functional and finished, but expect updates in the near future.
